section_title: Homosexual acts in the merchant navy: repeals
section_text: 1 In the Criminal Justice and Public Order Act 1994, omit sections 146(4) and 147(3) (homosexual acts as grounds for dismissal from the crew of merchant ships).

2 1 This Act comes into force on the day on which it is passed. 2 The repeals made by section 1 have the same extent as the provisions to which they relate. 3 Subject to subsection (2), this Act extends to England and Wales, Scotland and Northern Ireland. 4 This Act may be cited as the Merchant Shipping (Homosexual Conduct) Act 2017.
